Battle-of-Calfarn.name: Battle of Calfarn
description: The @+Battle of Calfarn+@ was the decisive battle in the invasion of Istagen by the Knights of the Sacred Dawn.

Battle-of-High-Tide.name: Battle of High Tide
description: The @+Battle of High Tide+@ was the largest naval battle in the war between the Archduchy of Zurast and the Realm of Lemuria over the Lepkar Peninsula.
